verbs.description: some [V: are] saying there is a peanut allergy epidemic now that world has basically shrugged off a dire climate change report by un scientists earlier this month predicting an environmental crisis as soon as 2040 we can get back to worrying about more pressing business such as the peanut allergy epidemic peanut allergy cnbc allergy epidemic united states nicholas a christakis london new england journal of medicine 1-in-70 kings college asthma peanut bbc france harvard medical school new york israel mount sinai hospital new york dr nicholas christakis hopkins press amazon mount sinai hospital newcastle university dr scott sicherer the journal of allergy and clinical immunology director jaffe food allergy institute denmark jaffe institute un centers for disease control and prevention official dr scott sicherer
